img.alt: Colorado (other variants) is a state in the western United States encompassing most of the southern Rocky Mountains as well as the northeastern portion of the Colorado Plateau and the western edge of the Great Plains. It is the 8th most extensive and 21st most populous U.S. state. The estimated population of Colorado is 5, 758, 736 as of 2019, an increase of 14.5% since the 2010 United States Census.
img.title: Colorado (other variants) is a state in the western United States encompassing most of the southern Rocky Mountains as well as the northeastern portion of the Colorado Plateau and the western edge of the Great Plains. It is the 8th most extensive and 21st most populous U.S. state. The estimated population of Colorado is 5, 758, 736 as of 2019, an increase of 14.5% since the 2010 United States Census.

subpod.plaintext: Colorado (other variants) is a state in the western United States encompassing most of the southern Rocky Mountains as well as the northeastern portion of the Colorado Plateau and the western edge of the Great Plains. It is the 8th most extensive and 21st most populous U.S. state. The estimated population of Colorado is 5, 758, 736 as of 2019, an increase of 14.5% since the 2010 United States Census.
